SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, GuiHandler
public abstract class View extends Object
The View class serves as an abstract base for handling the connection between the client and the server. It provides methods for setting up connections, sending messages, and handling various types of messages received from the server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    View()
    Constructs a View and loads the server address, socket port, and RMI port from a configuration file.

      Returns:

    • setUpSocketConnection

      public void setUpSocketConnection() throws IOException
      Sets up a socket connection with the server.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when creating the socket.

    • setUpRMIConnection

      public void setUpRMIConnection() throws RemoteException, NotBoundException
      Sets up an RMI connection with the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.
      NotBoundException - If the registry does not contain the requested binding.

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      Starts the view, to be implemented by subclasses.

    • disconnection

      public abstract void disconnection()
      Handles the disconnection from the server. This method should be implemented to manage any necessary cleanup or state adjustments when the connection to the server is lost or intentionally terminated.
